plot: Beyond Superman is a short documentary about the production of comic books. Interviews with a young comic book artist, comic book store owner and former Marvel editor explore the challenges with breaking into the comic book industry.
title: Beyond Superman
plot_es: Beyond Superman is a short documentary about the production of comic books. Interviews with a young comic book artist, comic book store owner and former Marvel editor explore the challenges with breaking into the comic book industry.
plot_en: Beyond Superman is a short documentary about the production of comic books. Interviews with a young comic book artist, comic book store owner and former Marvel editor explore the challenges with breaking into the comic book industry.
